indiyawe primiyar lig tharagawaliye dilli deya dewils, suprasiddha oostreliyawe sidni saya samajika tharaga, dakunu aprikawe anthar samaja tharagawaliyedi tharaga nawayakadi kadulu 16k laba wadima kadulu labime sama pandu yawannawimada jiwange dakshatha athara wiya. 2012 wasare 20-20 loka kusalana tharagawaliya 2015 wasare loka kusalana tharagawaliya batahira indiya kodew dupath dakunu aprika saha bangladeshaye 20-20 tharagawaliyanta da mohu sahabhagi wi thibe. 2010 sita 2015 dakwa shri lanka ekdina pila niyojanaya karamin tharaga 54ka ta sahabhagi wi inimaka lakunu 20 ka samanyayak da laba siti. 2011 sita 2018 dakwa 20-20 tharaga 22 kadi lakunu 207 k laba aththe samanya 18.8 k wartha karamini.
ee riyad nuwara aagamika uthsawayakata pamini sitiyadi.
"mak welada mehema wela thiyenne."
oyalath meka balanna.
antharjathika kamkaru sanwidhanaya penwa dena andamata, loka wirakiya thaththwaya 5.8% sita 5.9% dakwa wadi wi atha.
